it.polimi.se2019.limperio.nicotera.italia.controller

Class PowerUpController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.limperio.nicotera.italia.controller.PowerUpController

  • class PowerUpController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles the draught, the discard and the use of a power up card by a player
    Author:
    Pietro L'Imperio

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Reference of the controller.

      Reference of the game.
      private java.lang.String nicknameOfPlayerHasToBeMovedByNewton
      The nickname of the player that has to be moved by the use of Newton.
      private int numOfCardToUse
      The position in the power up cards deck of the power up card to use.

      This method finds the card of the model that matches with the alias card that the view has sent

      Get an array list where are contained all of the squares of the map.
      (package private) void handleChoosePlayerForNewton(ChoosePlayer choosePlayer)
      Handles the choice of the player on who use the effect of Newton sending another request to choose a square where move him.
      (package private) void handleDiscardOfCardToSpawn(DiscardPowerUpCardToSpawnEvent event)
      This method handles the draught of a power up by a player in order to be spawned in the square with the same color of the discarded card
      (package private) void handleDrawOfPowerUpCards(DrawPowerUpCards event)
      This method moves two power up cards from the deck to the player's deck and then it notifies to view part
      (package private) void handleRequestToUseNewton(ClientEvent message)
      Handles the request to choose Newton by the player sending the request to choose a player that he wants to move.
      (package private) void handleRequestToUseTeleporter(ClientEvent message)
      Handles the request by the client to use teleporter sending the request to choose a square where he wants to move.

      This method remove the cards from player's deck because they are used or draught
      (package private) void sendRequestToChooseSquareForSpawnOfTerminator()
      Sends the request to the player of the turn to choose a square where the terminator has to be generated in the first round or after his death.
      (package private) void sendRequestToDiscardPowerUpCardToBeGenerate(java.lang.String nickname)
      Sends the request to the player that has to be generated to discard a power up card so that he can decide where he wants to be generated.
      (package private) void spawnPlayer(Player playerWithThisNickname, Square square)
      This method places the player in the right spawn square and then generates the event in order to start the turn of the player
      (package private) void useNewton(SelectionSquare event)
      Handles the use of Newton after the request about player and square, moving the player chosen and sending map event and player board event to notify to all the players the new situation of the game.
      (package private) void useTeleporter(SelectionSquare message)
      Handles the use of the teleporter after that the player has chosen the square where he wants to move.

    • Method Detail

      • handleDrawOfPowerUpCards

        void handleDrawOfPowerUpCards(DrawPowerUpCards event)
        This method moves two power up cards from the deck to the player's deck and then it notifies to view part

      • sendRequestToChooseSquareForSpawnOfTerminator

        void sendRequestToChooseSquareForSpawnOfTerminator()
        Sends the request to the player of the turn to choose a square where the terminator has to be generated in the first round or after his death.

      • sendRequestToDiscardPowerUpCardToBeGenerate

        void sendRequestToDiscardPowerUpCardToBeGenerate(java.lang.String nickname)
        Sends the request to the player that has to be generated to discard a power up card so that he can decide where he wants to be generated.
        Parameters:
        nickname - The nickname of the player that has to be generated and that has to discard a power up card.

      • handleDiscardOfCardToSpawn

        void handleDiscardOfCardToSpawn(DiscardPowerUpCardToSpawnEvent event)
        This method handles the draught of a power up by a player in order to be spawned in the square with the same color of the discarded card
        Parameters:
        event - It is sent by the view and contains the references to the player that want to discard.

      • findSpawnSquareWithThisColor

        Square findSpawnSquareWithThisColor(ColorOfCard_Ammo color)
        This method finds the spawn square with the color that is passed.
        Parameters:
        color - the color of the square that is found.
        Returns:
        the spawn square that has the same color of the parameter.

      • removePowerCardFromPlayerDeck

        private void removePowerCardFromPlayerDeck(Player playerWithThisNickname,
                                           ServerEvent.AliasCard aliasPowerUpCard)
        This method remove the cards from player's deck because they are used or draught
        Parameters:
        playerWithThisNickname - the player that has the deck that has to be modified
        aliasPowerUpCard - the card that has to be removed from player's deck

      • findPowerUpCardFromAliasInPlayerDeck

        private PowerUpCard findPowerUpCardFromAliasInPlayerDeck(Player playerWithThisNickname,
                                                         ServerEvent.AliasCard aliasPowerUpCard)
        This method finds the card of the model that matches with the alias card that the view has sent
        Parameters:
        playerWithThisNickname - the player that is the owner of the card
        aliasPowerUpCard - the alias card that has to be matched with the card of the model
        Returns:
        the card of the model that matches with the alias card
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the alias card isn't owned by the player, or if the player that is passed isn't in the game

      • spawnPlayer

        void spawnPlayer(Player playerWithThisNickname,
                 Square square)
        This method places the player in the right spawn square and then generates the event in order to start the turn of the player
        Parameters:
        playerWithThisNickname - the player that has to be spawned

      • handleRequestToUseTeleporter

        void handleRequestToUseTeleporter(ClientEvent message)
        Handles the request by the client to use teleporter sending the request to choose a square where he wants to move.
        Parameters:
        message - Event received by the client.

      • getAllSquaresInTheMap

        private java.util.ArrayList<Square> getAllSquaresInTheMap()
        Get an array list where are contained all of the squares of the map.
        Returns:
        The array list with all of the squares of the map.

      • useTeleporter

        void useTeleporter(SelectionSquare message)
        Handles the use of the teleporter after that the player has chosen the square where he wants to move. Remove the power up card used and sends events about map and player board to notify to all the players the new situation of the game.
        Parameters:
        message - Event received by the client with row and column of the square where the player wants to move

      • handleRequestToUseNewton

        void handleRequestToUseNewton(ClientEvent message)
        Handles the request to choose Newton by the player sending the request to choose a player that he wants to move.
        Parameters:
        message - Event received by the client with the request to use Newton.

      • handleChoosePlayerForNewton

        void handleChoosePlayerForNewton(ChoosePlayer choosePlayer)
        Handles the choice of the player on who use the effect of Newton sending another request to choose a square where move him.
        Parameters:
        choosePlayer - Event received by the client with the nickname of the player chosen to use Newton.

      • useNewton

        void useNewton(SelectionSquare event)
        Handles the use of Newton after the request about player and square, moving the player chosen and sending map event and player board event to notify to all the players the new situation of the game.
        Parameters:
        event - Event received by client with the row and column of the square chosen to move the player.
